snippet: Online retailers like True&Co and HerRoom, along with some stalwarts like Maidenform, are trying to draw women from in-store fitting rooms to new online tools.
abstract: Elizabeth Olson Advertising column observes online retailers like True&Co and HerRoom, along with some stalwarts like Maidenform, are trying reinvent shopping for bras, which account for nearly half of the $14 billion annual lingerie market; notes they are vying to draw women from in-store fitting rooms to new online tools.
lead_paragraph: Online retailers like True&Co and HerRoom, along with some stalwarts like Maidenform, are trying to draw women from in-store fitting rooms to new online tools.
